transcript:
大家好，我是李璨。
Hi everyone, I’m Li Can. 今天咱们就聊一聊所有语言学习者在某一个时刻都会面临的问题，
Today, let’s talk about the problem that all language learners will face at a certain moment. 那就是：我为什么学不会一门语言了？
That is: Why I fail at learning a language? 不管是中文也罢，其他的所有语言也罢，都是一样。
Whether it’s Chinese or any other languages, it’s the same. 为什么学着学着那股子劲儿就不见了？
Why the passion to learn a language just disappears after learning for some time? 一开始接触一种全新语言的那种兴奋劲儿，
The excitement of being exposed to a new language at the beginning, 就在某一个时刻，某一天早上你醒来的时候，
Will at a certain moment, when you wake up one morning, 荡然无存了呢，为什么？
Be completely gone, why is that? 接着便是无边无际的迷茫，
Then there is boundless confusion, 慢慢地将你的自信心一点一点地吞没。
Which will slowly swallow your confidence bit by bit. 而问题慢慢就从“我为什么学不会这门语言”，
And the question will slowly switch from "Why I fail at Learning a language" to 变成了“我为什么要学这门破语言？
"Why should I learn this stupid language? 浪费我的时间，我的精力。”
Why wasting my time and my energy?" 中文无疑是世界上最难学习的语言之一，没有任何问题。
Chinese is undoubtedly one of the most difficult languages ​​in the world to learn, without any problem. 它最难的地方在于，
The hardest part of it is, 对于大多数语言学习者，
For most language learners, 中文和他的母语真是天差地别，差得太大了。
There is a huge difference between Chinese and his mother tongue. 中文在某一方面其实是很简单的，
Chinese is actually very simple in one aspect, 因为它基本没有什么语法，上手很快。
Because it basically has no grammar, it is quick to get started. 但是，在另外一方面，它又特别特别难，
However, on the other hand, it is particularly difficult. 也是因为它基本没有语法，
It's also because it basically has no grammar, 所以很多时候无迹可寻，
So very often there is no way to follow, 几乎没有规律可以套进去。
There are almost no rules to apply. 所有的方块字儿组成一个个句子，
All the Chinese characters form a sentence, 都是通过内在的意思连接在一块儿的，
 They are all connected by inner meaning, 而不是外在的语法结构。
Rather than external grammatical structure. 但是你想一想，
But think about it, 再难的语言它也不过是一门语言而已，
No matter how difficult the language is, it is just a language. 对于母语是中文的小朋友而言，
For children whose mother tongue is Chinese, 他就算不识字儿，他也能把中文说得非常溜。
Even if he is illiterate, he can still speak Chinese very fluently. 很多语言学习者都有一个困惑，
Many language learners are so confused, 就是：我为什么学中文学了这么久了，
Which is: after I've learned Chinese for so long, 还不如中国一个小朋友说得好呢？
Why I can't speak Chinese as good as a Chinese kid? 为什么？
Why? 有许多人以为这是语言环境使然，
Many people think this is due to the language environment, 但是我不这样觉得，
But I don’t think so, 我觉得他这样说更多是一个借口。
I think it is more of an excuse to say this. 其实小朋友学语言的动力比你强多了，
In fact, children’s motivation to learn languages ​​is much stronger than you. 因为这是关乎他们生存的问题。
Because it concerns their survival. 你想一想，你扪心自问一下，
Think about it, ask yourself, 你自己有这种动力吗？有这种紧迫感吗？
Do you have this kind of motivation yourself? Is there such a sense of urgency in you? 这就引出了我今天要说的一个非常重要的问题：
This leads me to a very important question today: 紧迫感。
A sense of urgency. 学语言是需要紧迫感的，同学们。
Language learning requires a sense of urgency, students. 其实大家学习语言的时候都特别容易掉入一个轻松的陷阱，
In fact, when learning a language, everyone is particularly easy to fall into a light-hearted trap. 就是每天学一点点，
Just learn a little bit every day, 今天学几个词汇，明天学几个语言表达方式，
Learn a few words today, and learn a few language expressions tomorrow, 可能自己会觉得：啊，我已经学了不少东西啦。
You might think: Ah, I have learned a lot. 真的是如此吗？
Is it really so? 但是就这样很轻松、很自在的每天学一点，
But learning a little every day very easily and comfortably, 在学校学一点，在网上学一点，
Learning a little at school, or learning a little online, 总感觉自己已经学了不少东西，
You might always feel that you have learned a lot, 总觉得自己可以沾沾自喜。
You might always be complacent.. 但是你真的可以说自己学会中文了吗，按这种方式？
But can you really say that you have learned Chinese, in this way? 你真的能自如地进行对话吗？
Can you really have a conversation with ease? 可能有些朋友能做到，进行一些简单的对话。可以哦。
Maybe some friends can do it and have some simple conversations. sure. 但是，大多数人都失败了。
However, most people fail. 为什么？
Why? 想想小孩子们是怎么学语言的？
Think about how children learn languages. 换言之，
In other words, 想一想你小时候是怎么学语言的？
Think about how you learned languages ​​when you were a kid. 有点儿感觉了吗？对，就是这样。
Feeling a little bit? Right, that is it. 小时候你学习语言是随时随地，永不停歇的。
When you were young, you learned language anytime, anywhere, and never stopped. 要么你在睡觉，要么你就在学习语言。
Either you were sleeping or you were learning a language. 你不相信吗？
You don't believe it? 你想一想，你是不是醒来的时候，
Think about it, was it true that when you woke up, 就在听父母和你说话？
You started to listen to your parents talking to you? 或者父母和亲人之间对话，
Or a conversation between parents and relatives, 或者电视上放一些对话。
Or some conversation on TV. 你一直在听，一直在吸收，
You have been listening, you have been absorbing, 不断不断地吸收。
Keep absorbing. 所以为什么有些父母他喜欢和孩子说话，
So when some parents like to talk to their children, 这个孩子他就比较容易早一些开口说话。
It is easier for this child to speak earlier. 比如有些父母不怎么喜欢和孩子说话，
If some parents don’t like talking to their children, 成天自己忙自己的事儿，
And they are am busy with my own affairs all day long, 这个孩子他肯定开口说话就比较晚。
Their children will start to speak later. 因为这个孩子他吸收的语言材料太少了，
Because this child has absorbed too little language materials, 还不足以整合成一个完整的语言把它输出出来。
And it is not enough to integrate it into a complete language and output. 为什么孩子们需要这么拼命地学习语言呀？
Why do children need to learn languages ​​so hard? 因为只有学会了语言，
Because only after learning the language, 他才能把自己的需求表达出来。
He can express his needs. 不然的话，只是靠比划或者啊啊啊地哭，
Otherwise, just rely on gestures or crying, 那可是非常难受的。
That is very uncomfortable. 然后很多时候表达不准确，
Many times their expressions are inaccurate, 父母理解不到位。
Or their parents do not understand well. 要是会说话的话，
If they can talk, 所有问题都迎刃而解了。
All the problems will be easily solved. 所以说，语言环境只有在这种情况才真正的有意义。
Therefore, the language environment will only be truly meaningful in this case. 因为在这种环境下，你没有任何别的选择，
Because in this environment, you have no other choice, 你只有拼命地去学习语言，
You can only work hard to learn the language, 拼命地去吸收，
Desperately to absorb, 拼命地让自己快点掌握这种语言，
Desperately make yourself master this language quickly, 你才能活下去。
So that you can survive. 以这种方式学习语言的话，它的效率才是最高的。
If you learn a language in this way, it will be most efficient. 咱们打个比方，比如某一天你突然被扔到了一个荒岛上。
 For example, one day you were suddenly thrown onto a deserted island. 但是荒岛上是有土著居民的，
But there are indigenous people on the desert island, 但是土著居民他只会说土著语，
And the indigenous people only speak aboriginal languages, 这个时候，你为了生存下去，
At this time, in order to survive, 为了不被吃掉，为了要有东西吃，
In order not to be eaten, in order to have something to eat, 你只得去学习他们的语言，
You have to learn their language, 我相信这个时候你学习他们语言的速度肯定是惊人的。
I believe the speed at which you learn their language at this moment must be amazing. 很快就能掌握精髓，
You can quickly grasp the essence, 很快就能开始对话。
and you can quickly start a conversation. 因为你有需要，你有需求，
Because you have urgent needs, 因为你有紧迫感。
Because you have a sense of urgency. 这就是大多数人学不会一门语言的原因，
This is why most people fail at learning a language. 因为他不够紧迫。
Because he is not urgent enough. 所以我说，如果你想要学会中文，
So I said, if you want to learn Chinese, 那么你就带着这种“活着还是不活”的这种紧迫感去学习吧。
Then you learn with this sense of urgency of "to be or not to be". 在最短的时间内去大量接触这种语言材料，
T get in touch with the language materials within the shortest time, 然后不断吸收，不断吸收，
Then keep absorbing, keep absorbing, 这样你才能最快地突破瓶颈，
This way you can break through the bottleneck the fastest, 最快地开始对话，
Start to have the conversations as quickly as possible, 开始真正地吸收中文。
And start to really absorb Chinese. 而不是你每天慢慢悠悠慢慢悠悠，
Instead of learning slowly every day, 今天学一点儿，明天学一点儿，
Learn a little today, learn a little tomorrow, 后天心情不好了，放一下，过几天再学一点儿，
The day after tomorrow you're in a bad mood, put it off, and learn a little later in a few days. 把学习的过程拉得异常的漫长。
So, the learning process will be extremely long. 或者你去报课，一个星期上一节课，或者两节课，
Or you go to have some classes, one class a week, or two classes a week, 你真觉得这有用吗？真觉得这有意义吗？
Do you really find this useful? Does it really make sense? 我告诉你，你这样的进度，一年、两年下去，
Let me tell you, with your progress, even after one or two years, 你可能连简单的对话都做不到。
You may not even be able to have simple conversations. 这不是危言耸听，
This is not saying frightening things just to raise an alarm, 所有中国学生们对这句话应该有很深刻的切身感受，
All Chinese students should have a very deep personal experience of this sentence, 因为我们学英语，
Because we learn English, 在我们那个年代是从初中开始的，现在更早，小学就开始了，
When I was a student, we started to learn English from middle school, but it's started earlier to elementary school, 但是到大学为止，
But until the university, 很多人一句简单的对话都没法做到。
Many people can't have a simple conversation. 为什么？没有紧迫感，慢慢悠悠，每天学一点。

And it’s not needed at all, it’s not learning for use at all, 所以他最终都根本学不会。
So he couldn't learn it at all in the end. 然后很多人到大学之后就把这个英语完全给扔掉了，
hen many people throw away this English completely after they are at university. 就好像从来没有学过这个东西一样。
It's as if they have never learned this language before. 因为语言其实很多时候不是用来学的，
Because language is actually not used to learn most of time, 是用来习得的，
It's to be acquired, 习得就是获取。
To acquire is to obtain. 是通过不断的语言材料的输入，
It is through continuous input of language materials, 在很快的时间内，
In a very short time, 让自己头脑里面构建出一个语言的楼房，
So as to let you build a building of language in your mind, 然后你就能开口说话。
Then you can speak. 就像我们小时候学自己的母语一样的，
Just like when we learned our own mother tongue when we were young, 不要把语言当成一门学问，
Don’t take language as a subject, 没有用的这样，你根本学不会的。
It's useless, you can't learn it this way. 来点儿紧迫感吧。

and becomes a chicken rib, 食之无味，弃之可惜。
